vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in MONEY_BOX.collect (patch_1.sol#45-53):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_1.sol#49-52)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- Acc (patch_1.sol#50)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: newMessage in Log.addMessage (patch_1.sol#76) is a local variable never initialiazed
